solution_line_template: Find the number of students who got their degree by multiplying: {total_students} students * {passed_percentage}% = <<{total_students}*{passed_percentage}*{percent_to_decimal_factor}={students_passed}>>{students_passed} students.

Then find the number of students who didn't pass their exams by subtracting this number from the total: {total_students} students - {students_passed} students = <<{total_students}-{students_passed}={students_failed}>>{students_failed} students.
